title: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog
description: When searching via Package view selection and dialog, no results are found.
OB: No results are displayed when searching for declarations using Package view selection and dialog.
EB: When searching for declarations via Package view selection and dialog, the expected behavior is to display the relevant results.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Package view.
2. Select a package and open the search dialog.
3. Search for a declaration.
4. Observe that no results are displayed.
